attributes.action: Stop all aid to Uganda amid their new policy on death sentence on homosexuality
attributes.additional_details: Stop all aid to country until it protects the lgbtq+ communy
attributes.background: Uganda's parliament has passed a new law where LGBTQI+ people could face the death penalty.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635322
